title: The Tinkered Pinkerton
description: Pinkerton agent Brom Donker's arm and legs were taken from him during the American Civil War. Now, ten years later, although he's adjusted to the metal limbs that replaced his real ones, there are times when he still feels like less than a man. Especially when he's near Simon Wain, his physician/mechanic.Simon has cared about Brom for years. As his patient. Lately, though, he's been seeing the handsome agent as more than that. But how can a lowly physician/mechanic fit in with a man from a powerful and influential family?As Brom deals with missing gun shipments, rogue Sasquatches, and disaffected Southerners, he and Simon confront their feelings about themselves and for each other.  Gay / Steampunk / Action / Adventure
author: Helen Louise Caroll
